testcase.name: Extract and sort Van Heusen discounted T-shirts by highest discount
testcase.classname: To Scrape Van Heusen discounted T-shirts on Myntra
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Extract and sort Van Heusen discounted T-shirts by highest discount # src/test/resources/features/myntra_scraper.feature:3 Given I navigate to "https://www.myntra.com" # steps.MyntraScraperSteps.NavigateToUrl(java.lang.String) When I select the "Men" category # steps.MyntraScraperSteps.SelectCategory(java.lang.String) And I filter by type "Tshirts" # steps.MyntraScraperSteps.FilterByType(java.lang.String) And I filter by brand "Van Heusen" # steps.MyntraScraperSteps.FilterByBrand(java.lang.String) Then I extract the discounted T-shirts data # steps.MyntraScraperSteps.ExtractDiscountedTshirts() Then I sort the tshirts by highest discount # steps.MyntraScraperSteps.SortDiscountedTshirts() DISCOUNTS FOR BRAND: Van Heusen
